mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.feizhiyuan_id as feizhiyuanId ,a.zhiyuanzhe_id as zhiyuanzheId ,a.zhiyuanzhe_liuyan_text as zhiyuanzheLiuyanText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_name as feizhiyuanName ,feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_phone as feizhiyuanPhone ,feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_id_number as feizhiyuanIdNumber ,feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_photo as feizhiyuanPhoto ,feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_email as feizhiyuanEmail ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_name as zhiyuanzheName ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_phone as zhiyuanzhePhone ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_id_number as zhiyuanzheIdNumber ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_photo as zhiyuanzhePhoto ,zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_email as zhiyuanzheEmail
FROM zhiyuanzhe_liuyan a left JOIN feizhiyuan feizhiyuan ON a.feizhiyuan_id = feizhiyuan.id left JOIN zhiyuanzhe zhiyuanzhe ON a.zhiyuanzhe_id = zhiyuanzhe.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.feizhiyuan_id = #{params.feizhiyuanId} )
and ( a.zhiyuanzhe_id = #{params.zhiyuanzheId} )
and a.zhiyuanzhe_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheLiuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.feizhiyuan_id IS NOT NULL
and feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.feizhiyuanName},'%')
and feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.feizhiyuanPhone},'%')
and feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.feizhiyuanIdNumber},'%')
and feizhiyuan.feizhiyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.feizhiyuanEmail},'%')
and a.zhiyuanzhe_id IS NOT NULL
and zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheName},'%')
and zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzhePhone},'%')
and zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheIdNumber},'%')
and zhiyuanzhe.zhiyuanzhe_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiyuanzheEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
